paper_metadata.title: MAIN TEXT
paper_metadata.extraction_summary: Extracted information regarding the TTR gene variant Val30Met, including penetrance data and individual records.

individual_records.evidence_sentence: The study sample included 209 adults (85 men and 124 women) with the Val30Met mutation.
109 participants had an established diagnosis of TTR-FAP in different evolution stages.

functional_data.summary: The Val30Met mutation is associated with TTR-FAP, leading to amyloid deposition.

variants.segregation_data: The disease is transmitted in an autosomal dominant way, with a penetrance that approaches 100% in areas of higher prevalence.
variants.additional_notes: The study highlights the psychological impact of TTR-FAP on patients and carriers.
key_quotes: The disease is transmitted in an autosomal dominant way, with a penetrance that approaches 100% in the areas of higher prevalence.

extraction_metadata.notes: Extracted data was primarily from the main text, with no additional tables containing variant information.
